fixes.name: Profit RAG
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR totalProfit = SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])
RETURN
IF(
    totalProfit < 60000,
    1,
    IF(totalProfit >= 60000 && totalProfit <= 80000, 2, 3)
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Computed totalProfit using SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) and applied conditional logic with IF to reproduce the Tableau nested IF/ELSEIF behavior. Returns 1 if totalProfit < 60000, 2 if between 60000 and 80000 inclusive, otherwise 3.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation contains aggregation (SUM), so it must be implemented as a measure.
